website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking a ridiculously inexpensive snow boot for their children should check out this fashionable option.
pros: A fantastic choice for infants and babies who haven't begun to walk
Interior is lined with warm fabric
cons: Many customers had difficulty figuring out the right size for their child

customer_reviews.title: Super cute pre-walkers!
customer_reviews.text: These little faux suede boots weren't made for walking but they are cute and have a soft sherpa-like lining. Think: slippers with a sole. They are definitely not waterproof but if you're going for a stroll with baby carried in a wrap or stroller, they will keep baby's feet warmer than socks alone. The Velcro closure makes it easy to get baby's feet in and the boots can be worn folded over which makes them a little more snug around the ankles. Baby may still kick them off but that's what babies do! The 6-12 month size measures approximately 5" from toe to heel (see photo). Not bad for $10. Hope this was helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: Cute warm boots for baby girl
customer_reviews.text: It’s very cute on my baby girl. My girl is 9mos and I size up 1 size, it fits perfectly. I love how it open/ close on the side with the velcro, so it can be tight on her feets. She tends to take off shoes on her feet to eat ( blame the teething), but she cannot take off this boots ( yet). Glad I got her the tan color, instead of pink, because the tan color goes with a lot of her clothes and not get dirty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dunxalon

customer_reviews.title: Huge but cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very big but very cute. I just put on some fluffy socks and they fit her fine. Definitely doesn’t fit 0-6, more like 6-12.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: 0-6 month size is closer to a 6 month
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 0-6 months which is sort of a catch all anyway if you ask me. If it fits a newborn well, it probably shouldn't fit a 6 month old, but I figured the material might be something flexible that would be snug on a newborn, then expand to comfortably fit a 6 month old. That wasn't the case. These should come in 0-3 months and then a next size. I gave them 5 stars for cuteness, but took off for the wide range, catch all sizing
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WARMTH FOR BABY
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THESE FOR MY BABY GRANDAUGHTER... SHE WILL BE OUT AND ABOUT WITH HER FAMILY AND NEEDS WARMTH, THEY FIT JUST AS EXPECTED. THOUGHT THEY WERE CUTE AND ALSO WOULD KEEP HER WARM, I ORDERED FROM TEXAS AND SENT THEM TO NY, NO HASSEL AND ARRIVED JUST AS THEY SAID THEY WOULD.
customer_reviews.author: B. SNEED

customer_reviews.title: For walkers or pre-walkers (size 13)
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely adorable shoes for babies, and they are suitable for kids who are beginning to stand or walk. The ones we received were a size 13.The bottoms are a flexible, porous material with non-slip areas, so they are not suitable for outside wear if your child is walking, but they will work well indoors. They are far too large for our baby, but they still work great in keeping his little feet warm. The reason for the 3 stars is because the item description needs to be greatly improved.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie's Themes

customer_reviews.title: this would get a love, but they are too big
customer_reviews.text: So, this would get a love, but they are too big. As I mentioned in one of my previous reviews, it would be great if the size would be 0 - 3 instead of 0 - 6. It would help with ensuring the shoe doesn't look like clown shoes on my daughter. Since this is a slip on, I'm not sure these will be worn now and I am thinking they will be out of season when she can fit them. I may pass them on to my God Daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Kei

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not good
customer_reviews.text: These boots are for a one year old that is just starting to walk. When i saw in the description that the bottoms were textured for walking, I guess i just expected a bit different. The boot is very flimsy and cheaply made. I do not think it will last through the winter-- and definitely not made to go outside when wet. Guess it was worth a try-- but i will not recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Ederer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a great quality baby shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about buying shoes off the internet, especially for my daughter because I didn’t know how they would look/fit. I’m pleased to say that they fit and look great! I got the tan ones, they’re very soft both on the outside and inside! Plus there’s enough room on the inside for winter socks. They can be rolled down to fit on the ankle, and there’s a velcro strap on the side to make them easier to put on a wiggly baby. Will probably purchase in another color because I liked them so much! This makes a great fall/winter shoe for your little one!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Faustino

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Fashionable & affordable. These boots are cute at this price. I don’t expect them to last forever, but babies grow so fast, so why pay extra. I got compliments from family on these boots. She’s small for her age at 13 months, so I got the 6-12 month size. They still have some room for her to grow, even with socks. They stayed on well, too. I love how easy they were to put on with the Velcro. Cons: they are pilling slightly after only two wears and I wish the sole was not cloth. It does have some grippers, so they are ok for indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Reetie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These are such cute little boots! They are stylish and east to put on your little one. I wasn’t concerned about supper because she isn’t walking. They go great with her outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for walkers
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these for the look of an UGG-type boot without the pricetag (for how quick these kiddos grow), but they do not stay on my 15 month walker. Two steps and they were already sliding off. I think because there is nothing to really catch the heel? I measured so I could get an accurate fit and if she was younger and not moving around yet, they might be fine but unfortunately they will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time buying these!
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this shoe 1 star! I should have listened to the other reviews about how the shoes constantly come off baby feet but I purchased anyway. I’m very disappointed, these shoes didn’t even stay on for 5min before slipping off. The problem is the neck of the boot is TOO wide which causes the entire boot to constantly slip off. I even tried to Velcro the boot tighter (not possible). It was an 8 dollar investment. You get what you pay for. Lesson learned!
customer_reviews.author: RereRose

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute. The stitching on the velcro came undone on one side of one shoe. I stitched it up really quick , so it wasn’t a big deal. My baby is 4 months old and they are pretty big, but that leaves room for her to grow into them over the winter. Overall I’m very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Angela backus

customer_reviews.title: Best for fashion statement
customer_reviews.text: These are great for TX winter weather when boots are used as fashion statement over warmth. I purchased these for my daughter who’s 12 months old. It’s a little big on her and really doesn’t have much support. She’s able to kick it off easily but loves putting them on. I anticipate her feet will grow a bit and by winter, it’ll be a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: K&D

customer_reviews.title: Two left feet
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I was naive, but I assumed that each boot would have a bow on the outside. But both boots have the bow on the left so the boot on the right foot has the bow on the inside of the ankle and looks like she is wearing two left shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Whitamore

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots & great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these little boots! Having a 3.5 month old, I’m not really into shoes as of yet. However after seeing a few moms with babies in their carriers wearing boot this fall to keep their feet warm, I ordered a pair. I was very impressed with the quality! Much better than anything you’d find at Old Navy or even Carters in the same price range. Will definitely be ordering more shoes in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: If someone could tell me how they get these on their child’s feet and have them stay on that’d be great! These are the most frustrating shoes I’ve ever purchased for my son. They definitely are the right size. Putting them on is such a pain and then he easily kicks them right off and he doesn’t do that with any of his other shoes. Wish I saved my money.
customer_reviews.author: KTie

customer_reviews.title: Well made and warm
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to get on my infant and comfortable. She is picky about her shoes (even though she's only 6 months) she loves these and never fusses when I put them on her! Great bargain for what I'd find comparable in stores!
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeSauce

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Felt like it was made of soft cardboard and not made well at all. My walking baby could not walk in these. What's worse is I returned them and never received my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these booties
customer_reviews.text: Love these booties. They are cute, soft, and stay on. They are a little tough to get on my baby's foot, she has wide feet, but once you open them up wider with the velcro strap, they wiggle on pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear6101213

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Fits on the larger size but that was expected. My daughter is 12 months and purchased the 18 months so she'll get to grow into them this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Not made properly
customer_reviews.text: I dislike these. They are cut weird and do not stay on my babies feet! Even when just sitting. They seem to be the correct size but are just strange they way they are made they don’t fit the feet properly it’s like they are doll shoes. Besides that they would be cute, but unfortunately, these are being sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Alie K

customer_reviews.title: Cute and simple.
customer_reviews.text: This shoes is super cute and simple. I wish I can keep it. Sadly, it doesn’t seem normal. It’s weird! When I put my baby feet in there, it keep bringing her heel back to the part where you stick your feet in.
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft. My 6 month old was a little small for these, but fine if I put wool socks over a cotton sleeper. The insert on one was lost pretty quickly. I think my toddler had something to do with that. Not terribly high quality, but she won't fit in them for long.
customer_reviews.author: A Wayne

customer_reviews.title: So cute! a must buy
customer_reviews.text: these are tiny and only decorative -- there is NO arch support and none needed they would only fit a newborn. they are adorable! I bought them for my Niece and I cannot wait until she is born to try them on her!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn11215

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not rugged
customer_reviews.text: Cute for photo shoots - soles are not a thick material so wouldn’t recommend wearing in rain/daily use outside, but cute for indoors events and such
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Very cute boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my 1-year old daughter. She is learning to walk now so these boots are very suitable for her. The bottom is very soft and it fits her with her socks on. What’s more, it is so cute! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: These boots are so cute and my daughter will grow ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so cute and my daughter will grow in to them. They are a little hard to get on her but that could be that she is not used to wearing shoes yet.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A.

customer_reviews.title: Double check the size!
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not for 6-12 months! I do like the style and they are very cute but they are huge and I have no idea when my little one will even fit into them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Kong

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, couldn’t use cause wouldn’t stay on feet
customer_reviews.text: Never stayed on babies feet! So sad I loved these but they just didn’t work. I think the length width is just to wide. My baby is in the 50% tile so average size. They Just would not stay on at all. Baby wasn’t evening crawling when I bought these. I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Closes with Velcro, instead of a zipper.
customer_reviews.text: Fit was good. Quality of the shoe is ok. This shoe closes with a long piece of Velcro on the inside of the shoe. It made it difficult to Velcro shut when my baby was wearing socks. These are still cute and match a lot of her wardrobe!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hodge

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these more as a prop to announce our pregnancy to our friends while we were standing on an Alaskan glacier on our 10 yr anniversary. The worked perfectly. Now that she is here, they are still slightly to big sober havent been able to wear then just yet but they seem to be great quality
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Javor

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: They are cute. The Velcro side closer is super handy. However, my 7 week old baby girl’s feet are about HALF the size of the 0-6 month (smallest they sell). Her feet just pull right out of the boot with no troubles. Wish there was a SMALLER size Bc these won’t be usable until some major foot growth happens.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Awwww! :)
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and definitely awwwww! Love them i did get a bit bigger for room to grow. I bought 12-18 month size and about an inch room still. She is 6 1/2 month-almost 18 lbs and length of foot approximately 4” long. Wonderful quality and non slip bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline A. Antosh

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Bought big for my chunky 6 month old. They are cute and furry inside. I think they will work fine to keep baby's feet warm this winter.
customer_reviews.author: supertini

customer_reviews.title: Velcro should be a little tighter.
customer_reviews.text: In overall the shoes are very warm, fit good, they are soft and very flexible for child. However sometimes may come off due to velcro not latching on tight enough , this is especially true when toddler is walking they tend to slip off!
customer_reviews.author: SP1

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit well at all! can't use them...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was super excited, but when I received the shoes they were too large for my 8mo old (i purchased the 6-12mo size). Also I have no idea why, but it was like I couldn't get her foot in flat even though there was plenty of room...
customer_reviews.author: Happygal

customer_reviews.title: Super cute boots
customer_reviews.text: The shape is beautiful aesthetically, and super cute. Sometimes these type of boots can look a bit wonky, but not this one. And I love the sole for these little boots. It’s fits my two years old little feet perfectly. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mich k

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely adorable!! My baby is almost 3 months old and the only way they stay on her is cuz of her chunky calves. Her feet are so much smaller but super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate product sizing description :(
customer_reviews.text: These boots are adorable! Based on the product description I ordered a size M (6-12 months) however received a size 13. These shoes are huge and are almost double the length of my LO’s foot. 5 stars for cuteness and 2 stars for misleading and inaccurate product description.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: So WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: To cute my baby is only 6months but will be so perfect for the winter love these so much too cute so soft and warm and go perfect with anything really
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit real baby feet
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I tried these on my daughter. Baby feet aren’t flat. They got some bulk to them. So why make the toe area flat? What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Ginnie

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Kind of small, though they were long enough. They were very narrow and would not stay on my child’s feet.
customer_reviews.author: Karissah

customer_reviews.title: Cute but Didn’t fit like I expected.
customer_reviews.text: They looked so cute but one didn’t have a Velcro to close. And even on the one that did close they bunches up and didn’t stay on when crawling or trying to stand..
customer_reviews.author: Florida Native

customer_reviews.title: These boots are SO SO SO CUTE and are exactly ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are SO SO SO CUTE and are exactly as pictured, but my baby girl is 7 months old and these shoes just fly off her feet. And she does not have dainty feet either. But don't tell her I said so. It breaks my heart to have to return them! :(
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: It is super cute. I bought this for my niece and everyone loves it. She looks comfortable with it. The fabric inside the boots is soft. The boots is washable.
customer_reviews.author: Van Phan

customer_reviews.title: Not protective just cute
customer_reviews.text: Too cheap looking, no soul at the bottom to protect babys feet. Going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and they're just adorable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get on and they're just adorable. She gets so many compliments on these! Perfect for keeping her feet warm. They're okay for walking but not for too long unless I'm holding her hands. Now that she's got a little speed, the soles sometimes slip down.
customer_reviews.author: Mishmosh

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because baby socks wouldn’t stay on and needed something for winter. We got so many compliments on these adorable boots and they are kept my 3mo old’s feet nice and warm!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ash

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for walking babies.
customer_reviews.text: They are cute for baby that don't walk or prewalk my baby is pre walking and when she has them on they slip side ways and looks wrong but like I said cute idea for babies who aren't walking yet...
customer_reviews.author: Maricela Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Apple bottom jeans... Boots with the fur!
customer_reviews.text: Boots with fur... nothing much cuter than this! Our daughter looks adorable in these! Her chubby chubby calves though make it hard to velcro, no fault to these though, shes just a chubs. If the manufacture took into consideration the chubby babies then the calf portion would be more loose and rounded to accommodate.
customer_reviews.author: TheHoskins12

customer_reviews.title: Cute and warm
customer_reviews.text: They are so adorable. Very warm. Some days to warm but so super cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my two month old and they were a little big for her but now just right. Very cute! No need to spend 50-70 dollars on a pair of baby Ugg’s when they are gonna grow out of them so fast. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cute weather boots.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and in time to be worn today. Fitted perfectly nice. Cheap price too.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - Bow fell off in one wear
customer_reviews.text: My six month old wore these one time and the bow fell off of one of the shoes. Waste of money as the quality isn't good. They're adorable and look comfortable but unfortunately don't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: L. Zel

customer_reviews.title: Velcro band not wide enough to close
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are absolutely cute as can be but the velcro to close them that wraps around the calf isn’t wide enough to close on my daughter. I think these would work if you baby is very tall/lanky- otherwise, they may not fit and stay on snug.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has smaller feet and I could never get her feet in these without her walking out of them. She never got to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Cammi

customer_reviews.title: These are super cute and keep our baby's feet warm
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and keep our baby's feet warm. After a few times that she has worn it they seem to be losing their shape somewhat, but nothing terrible. They fit as expected and the baby cannot push them off easily (she's pushing everything off within a second) but not these. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: G. F.

customer_reviews.title: Too cute 😘😘😘😘
customer_reviews.text: I just ❤️ it. This shoe is super cute very lightweight and very soft. I would recommend everyone to buy this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Mommy and baby approved.
customer_reviews.text: Mommy and baby love them. Baby got a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Carreiro

customer_reviews.title: Really cute boots but not for chubby babies.
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and warm. Only complaint is that they are not made for chubby babies. They wouldn’t close well around her leg, so the Velcro kept getting stuck on her clothes.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalMommy

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: A little too wide and didn’t offer much support for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I can only tell you that they are adorable! I purchased them for a gift, so that is the extent of my knowledge about them.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just waste of your money don’t buy it. For the same price you can buy at carters way better quality shoes for your baby. I returned it. Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Zhyparzat

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Narrow and difficult to put on. Not as pretty or quality as picture
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the winter
customer_reviews.text: It’s sooo cute but its large I got 0-6 months and she’s four months
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and a great deal for the price. My 8 month old can wear the 0-6 month size. I'd say they run a tad large.
customer_reviews.author: GoGreenSpartans

customer_reviews.title: Sizes not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so annoyed. The sizes to choose from were not the same as what was delivered. I chose 6-12 month. What I received was a size 3 which was 6-9 month. I would’ve preferred 9-12 month size as my baby will grow out of these in probably a month. Other than that they’re cute.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these on my daughter! They keep her feet warm while we’re outside or in the car seat on the way to the car. They don’t slip off easily either which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but very small for my 12 month old
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend the money on UGGs for a child that is growing so fast. These are great to slip on and off. And they will keep her feet warm! Plus they look cute.
customer_reviews.author: Monica tomshack

customer_reviews.title: The boots are well made and look like their adult counterpart.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves the boots,,for my great granddaughter. How classy that baby will be!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 months old daughter. It is still big for her feet but I was planning to make her put on when she is able to sit on herself. Its very light and soft. Arrived on time. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonuser413

customer_reviews.title: Just too cute!
customer_reviews.text: These booties are too cute! I got them for a baby shower and they were just perfect. Everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: Cute :)
customer_reviews.text: Love these... so cute on my 3 mo old. Sometimes slip off but doesn't matter as she's not walking obviously. Also I cant fold mine down, they're too stiff... but they're cute as is! Get lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Megan VW

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stay on her feet
customer_reviews.text: These don’t stay on my babies feet. They don’t tighten up around the ankle at all so her foot slides easily out.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: They should start at size 0 to 3mos.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that they are made for 0 t o 6mo.All babies feet aren't the same size.
customer_reviews.author: BottDaught

customer_reviews.title: Ugly in person
customer_reviews.text: They look like they came straight from the dollar store. Cute in photos advertised but very disappointing in person Returned immediately
customer_reviews.author: kathryn estes

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and cute
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it fits my daughter but once i put them on they are falling off, i dont know why, maybe they were little big
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter when she was 4 months old just so she would have something warm on her feet during the winter. I got the 0-6 month size. She's 7 months now and has outgrown them. But... I just got another pair to ride out the rest of the winter.
customer_reviews.author: keisha king

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Cute Boot.
customer_reviews.text: I used for a baby doll and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: just.me

customer_reviews.title: Very small, flimsy
customer_reviews.text: NOT for a walking baby. They run very small, would not stay on my babe's feet. The would be perfect for a very small baby, not for a mobile infant.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: but just don't expect great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but definitely NOT for walkers. My daughter is 12 months old and is walking. The fake leather finish on the bottoms rubbed off instantly (literally after just a few steps). Still cute, but just don't expect great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lcp

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good boots
customer_reviews.text: Cute and perfect for the price. They tend to fall off and when she stands in them. They fold on the heels funny so it's uncomfortable for her to walk but they do the job in the car seat going to and from the vehicle!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Palubicki

customer_reviews.title: Great for cost
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful the baby like them. She kicks all the other shoes off but these. Amazing
customer_reviews.author: roxannebush

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love , Love , Love these are awesomely cute .
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Adorable !
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and keeps baby warm. Great quality too! Not cheap looking but actually nice.
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but too easy for escape artist
customer_reviews.text: I bought them a little large but it seems like they will be super easy to kick off even when they fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Maux

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect for winter baby!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE BOOTS! Such cute design and good quality, the velcro sides make them easy to put on and off!
customer_reviews.author: E. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh.........too adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend's 1 year old granddaughter and they are way too cute. Can't wait to get a pic with her wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Riverside, CA

customer_reviews.title: Dont stay on
customer_reviews.text: The shape of these boots were odd and they didnt ever stay on her feet
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Maria Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Kept falling off foot
customer_reviews.text: These didn't work for us. They were the right size but kept sliding off.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Strange fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what the issue is with this bootie - in theory, it should be too large based on baby's foot size, but I can't get it past his ankle. The bootie itself is adorable, but is just not functional.
customer_reviews.author: hy

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 5 month old. They fit nicely and are super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These little boots are perfect for the fall and winter. Well made and satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sung but Cute
customer_reviews.text: Hard to put on; a little snug on my little ones chunky feet but very cute & she doesn’t mind them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a huge fan of this boot. It would not stay on my 6 month olds foot. The design is flawed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Na
customer_reviews.text: Baby not born yet, not sure as to how they will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Staines

customer_reviews.title: Well, these are winter boots, should also account ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, these are winter boots, should also account for the thick socks. selected size 12-18 months, but found to be small for the 13 months baby. The product otherwise seems to be good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LIVEBOX Prewalker Toddler Boots Premium Soft Anti-Slip Sole Warm Winter Boots for Infant Baby Girls
product_meta.description:
Item Type: First Walkers
Size: Fit For 0-18 Months Baby
Season: Winter
Gender: Baby Girls

Specifications: 
Size S: Recommended Age: 0-6 Months; Heel to toe Length: 11 cm / 4.25 inches
Size M: Recommended Age:6-12 Months; Heel to toe Length:12.cm/4.76 inches 
Size L: Recommended Age :12-18 Months; Heel to toe Length: 13 cm / 5.11 inches? 
1 inch= 2.54 cm

Note: The recommended age is just for your reference, Please measure your baby's foot length to choose the right size
for your baby because of the different measurement methods, there may be 1-2 cm of the allowable range error

Besides there might be slight color deviation due to different displays. 

Package includes:1 pair of shoes
feature_bullets: 100% soft baby friendly leather + man-made fleece, safety tested for peace of mind.
Classic, high quality cotton with soft soles and elastic openings to help keep them on.
Soft, lightweight and anti-slip sole is well-crafted to make walking feel natural.
Makes a perfect baby shower, birthday present or "just because" for your very own little love.
100% Satisfaction Guaranteed Zero Hassle Returns - Return your shoes for any reason.
